## Set Global options

```{r setOptions, echo=FALSE}
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, results="hide")
```

First simulate data
```{r simulatedata, echo=TRUE}
x<- rnorm(100); y<- x + rnorm(100, sd=.5)
```

Here's a scatter plot of the data
```{r scatterplot, fig.height=4}
par(mar= c (5,4,1,1), las =1)
plot(x,y)
